cu.explanation_en: Setting the integrity algorithm to the unknown enum 'nia9' will cause negotiation failure during the security negotiation phase and NAS registration rejection.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssb_perRACH_OccasionAndCB_PreamblesPerSSB to 100 exceeds the valid range (0-15), causing invalid RACH configuration and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssb_perRACH_OccasionAndCB_PreamblesPerSSB 設定為 100 超過有效範圍（0-15），會導致無效的 RACH 配置和細胞設定失敗。
